definition: variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]

sentences.english: Conforming faculty, condensing direction, speeding up the construction of the applied mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 整合力量，凝炼方向，加快应用数学学科建设。

sentences.english: Concise lines toes form the space of refine is experienced is showily and not make public.
sentences.chinese: 简洁线条凝炼的空间感受是华贵而不张扬。

sentences.english: There is heavy tea culture in Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 佛文化中凝炼着深沉的茶文化。

sentences.english: Pure noun phrases of modern English are highly compact, concise, full of meanings and widely used.
sentences.chinese: 现代英语纯名词短语高度凝炼，意义丰富，广为运用。

sentences.english: Mr. Yamada is a very polished speaker.
sentences.chinese: 山田是一个说话优雅凝炼的人。

sentences.english: To build a brand, you generally need to "contract" the brand.
sentences.chinese: 而为了塑造品牌，你则更需要凝炼品牌。

sentences.english: Its language is fresh and implied.
sentences.chinese: 其语言艺术新鲜形象，含蓄凝炼。

sentences.english: However, it seems that, with some stanzas incompact, the poem lacks conciseness.
sentences.chinese: 但是长诗也有不够凝炼之嫌，有些章节显得较松散。

definition: variant of 洗練|洗练[xi3 lian4]
stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
to condense/to coagulate/coacervation (i.e. form tiny droplets)/aggregation/coherent
